title: How Slingback Kitten Heels Elevate 9-to-5 Dressing
excerpt: From the boardroom to the bar, these are the best slingback kitten heels. Click to browse our favorite ones.
text: Best Animal Print Tony Bianco Crush Slingback Kitten HeelWorn by celebrities and style insiders alike, Tony Bianco shoes have earned their moment in the limelight. This bold cow-print pair delivers a dose of trendiness and is guaranteed to turn heads from cubicle to coffee run. Sizes: 5-10Colors: 10 optionsBest Designer Prada Patent Leather Slingback PumpsLean into luxury with this patent leather pair from Prada. The signature triangular logo pops atop the shoe’s sleek design. Sizes: 34-42.5Colors: Ivory, BlackAdvertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest Mary Jane Gucci Leather Horsebit PumpA springy take on the beloved Mary Jane, this preppy rounded toe pair is perfect for butter yellow’s current stardom. Sizes: 6-10Colors: Yellow, Black, Bright Pink, Dark Green, Rosso AncoraBest Lace Detail Neous Irena Crepe de Chine SlingbacksFor Dale Arden Chong, ELLE's senior fashion commerce editor, this brand has mastered head-turning staples. “Neous has a way of taking classic silhouettes and making them feel a little unexpected,” she says. “Case in point: the Irena Crepe de Chine slingbacks. That little peek of lace is just what I need for these to feel undoubtedly chic but with a understated allure.”Sizes: 5-9Colors: BlackAdvertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest with HardwareTory Burch Pierced Slingback HeelConsidering some new bling? Try this dreamy pair, outfitted with hardware, which is one of the hottest runway trends for fall. Sizes: 5-12Colors: Coconut Shell, Perfect BlackBest Metallic Cos Pointed Leather Slingback Kitten HeelMetallic accessories are a fabulous way to elevate your all-black ensembles, everyday office attire, or even a pair of jeans. Sizes: 6-12Colors: Silver, BlackAdvertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest Embossed Jacquemus Croc-Embossed Leather Slingback PumpsOutfitted with the house’s signature geometric embellishments, this croc-embossed pair adds an artistic twist to any look.Sizes: 6-11Colors: Midnight BrownBest Studded Reformation Sadie Kitten Heeled SlingbackPretty in pickle? Bet you haven’t heard that one before. This green ombre number boasts flare in the form of delicate silver studs.Sizes: 5-11Colors: Pickle Satin Best Buckled Givenchy Voyou Slingback HeelsBuckle up! Opt for this funky denim option for a bit of Y2K glamor. Sizes: 35-42Colors: NavyBest Under $100Steve Madden Liana There’s so much to love about this cherry-colored select from Steve Madden—including the price tag. Reviewers rave about this strappy shoe’s comfort and ankle support. Sizes: 5-12Colors: Wine, Black, MochaAdvertisement - Continue Reading BelowBest Mesh Mango Slingback Pointed Toe Kitten Heel PumpA little breathability goes a long way, especially when the forecast reads eighty-plus degrees. Enter mesh heels: the chic solution to staying cool. This blush pair is embellished with tonal beads for extra detail. html:
Best Animal Print

Tony Bianco Crush Slingback Kitten Heel

Worn by celebrities and style insiders alike, Tony Bianco shoes have earned their moment in the limelight. This bold cow-print pair delivers a dose of trendiness and is guaranteed to turn heads from cubicle to coffee run.

Sizes: 5-10

Colors: 10 options

Best Designer

Prada Patent Leather Slingback Pumps

Lean into luxury with this patent leather pair from Prada. The signature triangular logo pops atop the shoe’s sleek design.

Sizes: 34-42.5

Colors: Ivory, Black

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Mary Jane

Gucci Leather Horsebit Pump

A springy take on the beloved Mary Jane, this preppy rounded toe pair is perfect for butter yellow’s current stardom.

Sizes: 6-10

Colors: Yellow, Black, Bright Pink, Dark Green, Rosso Ancora

Best Lace Detail

Neous Irena Crepe de Chine Slingbacks

For Dale Arden Chong, ELLE's senior fashion commerce editor, this brand has mastered head-turning staples. “Neous has a way of taking classic silhouettes and making them feel a little unexpected,” she says. “Case in point: the Irena Crepe de Chine slingbacks. That little peek of lace is just what I need for these to feel undoubtedly chic but with a understated allure.”

Sizes: 5-9

Colors: Black

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best with Hardware

Tory Burch Pierced Slingback Heel

Considering some new bling? Try this dreamy pair, outfitted with hardware, which is one of the hottest runway trends for fall.

Sizes: 5-12

Colors: Coconut Shell, Perfect Black

Best Metallic

Cos Pointed Leather Slingback Kitten Heel

Metallic accessories are a fabulous way to elevate your all-black ensembles, everyday office attire, or even a pair of jeans.

Sizes: 6-12

Colors: Silver, Black

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Embossed

Jacquemus Croc-Embossed Leather Slingback Pumps

Outfitted with the house’s signature geometric embellishments, this croc-embossed pair adds an artistic twist to any look.

Sizes: 6-11

Colors: Midnight Brown

Best Studded

Reformation Sadie Kitten Heeled Slingback

Pretty in pickle? Bet you haven’t heard that one before. This green ombre number boasts flare in the form of delicate silver studs.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: Pickle Satin

Best Buckled

Givenchy Voyou Slingback Heels

Buckle up! Opt for this funky denim option for a bit of Y2K glamor.

Sizes: 35-42

Colors: Navy

Best Under $100

Steve Madden Liana

There’s so much to love about this cherry-colored select from Steve Madden—including the price tag. Reviewers rave about this strappy shoe’s comfort and ankle support.

Sizes: 5-12

Colors: Wine, Black, Mocha

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Mesh

Mango Slingback Pointed Toe Kitten Heel Pump

A little breathability goes a long way, especially when the forecast reads eighty-plus degrees. Enter mesh heels: the chic solution to staying cool. This blush pair is embellished with tonal beads for extra detail.

Sizes: 5-9

Colors: Blush

Best Sandal

Larroudé Mini Annie Sandal

Whether you're traipsing through the Caribbean, dining al fresco, or just grabbing coffee before a morning meeting, this airy sandal adds a touch of summer magic to every step.

Sizes: 5-11

Colors: White, Ivory, Gold Metallic, Black

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Elasticated

Toteme The Sharp Slingback Pumps

This moss-hued style from Toteme offers an essential pop of color with an elasticated slingback strap for added comfort.

Sizes: 5-8

Colors: Laurel

Why Trust ELLE

Every product featured on ELLE.com is independently researched, tested, or editor-approved. We only recommend products that we stand behind, and the merchandise featured on our site is always driven by editorial and product testing standards, not by affiliate deals or advertising relationships. Any content created in partnership with advertisers is marked as such.
